Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: グリュンヘルデの商人
Entry.EnglishText: Merchant

Entry.JapaneseText: グリュンヘルデ
Entry.EnglishText: Grunhelde

Entry.JapaneseText: グリュンヘルデ・雑貨屋
Entry.EnglishText: Grunhelde - General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 雑貨屋
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金をください…… 品物をあげます……お金をください……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... Please... I'll offer you some articles... Give me money, please...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 品物を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金こそ…… お金を増やす事こそ…… ヒトが生きる意味……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... Money is... Making more money is... The meaning of our lives...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金さえあれば…… お金さえあれば…… お金さえあれば……
Entry.EnglishText: If you have money... If you have money... If you have money...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金で買えないものは…… ……自分の命だけ……
Entry.EnglishText: The only thing you can't buy with money is...your own life...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金を持ち、余裕がある者の心は 常に優しく、慈愛に満ちている……
Entry.EnglishText: The heart of those who have money and are wealthy is always full of kindness and benevolence...

Entry.JapaneseText: お金があって、ゆとりがあるからこそ 他人に優しくなれる……
Entry.EnglishText: Since I have money and I'm wealthy, I can be kind to others...

Entry.JapaneseText: 貧しい者の心は、常に乾いている…… 他人をねたみ、奪い、だまそうとする…… それはお金がないせいだ……
Entry.EnglishText: The hearts of the poor are always dry... They envy, steal and deceive others... It's all because they have no money...

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金は…… さらにお金を生み、増え続ける……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... Money... It produces more money and continues increasing...

Entry.JapaneseText: 豊かな者はより豊かに…… 貧しい者はより貧しく……
Entry.EnglishText: The rich are richer... The poor are poorer...

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金は…… 持てば持つほど増え続ける魔物……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... Money is... A monster that keeps growing the more you have...

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金自体は…… 単なる目盛りにすぎない…… 単なる紙切れや金属にすぎない……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... Money itself is... Nothing but a mere scale... Nothing but a simple piece of paper or metal...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、その目盛りは…… ヒトの値打ちであり、正義…… 全ての力の源……
Entry.EnglishText: However, that scale is... The price of people... Justice... The source of all power...

Entry.JapaneseText: カネ……カネ……お金が欲しい…… もっともっとお金が欲しい……
Entry.EnglishText: Money... Money... I want money... I want more and more money...

Entry.JapaneseText: もっと……もっと…… お金をください……
Entry.EnglishText: More... More... More money, please.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 入口に戻ると引き返せません 入口に戻りますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Going back to the entrance is a one way trip. Go Back Stay
